com.softwareag.wx.is.config.location.alias

Class Aliases

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.softwareag.wx.is.config.location.alias.Aliases

  • public class Aliases
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage file location aliases that are configured per system

    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        public static java.lang.String getPath(java.lang.String alias)
        Get path for alias. This additional method is required because the information is first needed at startup of WxConfig. At that point it is not yet possible to query the property in the normal way. So although this method somewhat duplicates functionality, it is still necessary.
        Returns:
        Path for alias

      • getKeyForPath

        public static java.lang.String getKeyForPath(java.lang.String alias)
        Outside the startup of WxConfig the recommended way for access to alias configuration is via the normal classes/methods. This method returns the key needed to retrieve the path of a given alias.
        Parameters:
        alias - Alias name
        Returns:
        path configured for alias

      • getType

        public static java.lang.String getType(java.lang.String alias)
        Get type for alias
        Parameters:
        alias - Alias value
        Returns:
        type of a location alias

      • getDescription

        public static java.lang.String getDescription(java.lang.String alias)
        Get description for alias
        Parameters:
        alias - Alias value
        Returns:
        description of a location alias

        Create IData representation of alias
        Parameters:

      • getFilesForAlias

        public static ConfigFileList getFilesForAlias(java.lang.String alias)
        Get all config files included via alias group by alias
        Returns:
        map with all known aliases and a list of files that are using them
